channel.title: DIY on Paul Hartman

item.title: Changing a Tail, Reverse or Rear Turn Signal Bulb on a 2016 Nissan Altima
item.description: So I had a taillight bulb go out on me this week, and changing that bulb was simple enough, but also not particularly obvious. Had to look it up and could only find a overly long winded youtube video on it. In the interest of saving some one else the headache of scrubbing through a 20 min video to get answer that could have been explained in 2 minute short, I figured I would write it out.
